Change point detection: a general formulation¶

A general framework is introduced in this review of methods [CTOV18].

References

CTOV18

C. Truong, L. Oudre, and N. Vayatis. A review of change point detection. arXiv preprint arXiv:1801.00718, pages 1–31, 2018. arXiv:1801.00718.
